headline: 3 Reasons to Avoid FTV and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Fortive’s stock price has taken a beating over the past six months, shedding 37.5% of its value and falling to $50.14 per share. This was partly due to its softer quarterly results and may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.
